com.adobe.rtc.messaging
Class UserRoles

java.lang.Object
  com.adobe.rtc.messaging.UserRoles

public class UserRoles
extends java.lang.Object

UserRoles is a class for holding the constant values for standard user roles. Roles are all stored as integers.

See Also:
NodeConfiguration

Field Summary
static int LOBBY
          LOBBY can only subscribe to collections such as the ones used for knocking or for features in the lobby.
static int NONE
           
static int OWNER
          OWNER can create, configure, and delete nodes, as well as publish and subscribe.
static int PUBLISHER
          PUBLISHER can publish and subscribe to most nodes but cannot create, delete or configure nodes.
static int VIEWER
          VIEWER can subscribe to most nodes but cannot publish or configure.

Field Detail

NONE

public static final int NONE
See Also:
Constant Field Values

LOBBY

public static final int LOBBY
LOBBY can only subscribe to collections such as the ones used for knocking or for features in the lobby.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

VIEWER

public static final int VIEWER
VIEWER can subscribe to most nodes but cannot publish or configure. It corresponds to "NONE" in XEP-60.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PUBLISHER

public static final int PUBLISHER
PUBLISHER can publish and subscribe to most nodes but cannot create, delete or configure nodes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OWNER

public static final int OWNER
OWNER can create, configure, and delete nodes, as well as publish and subscribe. The OWNER is typically the person who created the room.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

UserRoles

public UserRoles()
